DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective compare gum response three different dental implant design place front region upper jaw . The change baseline one year compare . The null-hypothesis buccal soft tissue ( gum ) change baseline one year equal three implant-abutment interface setting .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Appearance Function Three Different Dental Implant Designs When Placed Front Region Upper Jaw
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent At least 18 year In need one single implant replace miss nonrestorable teeth maxilla within region 14 24 The following consider inclusion fulfil Visit 2 : Edentulous least 5 month study site A buccallingual bone width study site least 5.5 mm A mesialdistal bone level distance adjacent teeth study site least 5.5 mm A keratinize midbuccal mucosal height least 2 mm study site Teeth adjacent ( mesial distal ) study site must consist two stable teeth natural root without sign periodontal bone loss ( > 1 mm ) and/or significant soft tissue loss Teeth adjacent ( mesial distal ) study site must demonstrate stable occlusal guidance allow nonfunctional disclusion eccentric position An oppose dentition teeth , implant prosthesis Insufficient interocclusal distance implant placement restoration study site Tooth adjacent ( mesial and/or distal ) study site ankylose More 2 mm vertical bone loss study site measure midbuccal crest bone adjacent teeth Site development ( bone tissue ) perform less 5 month Visit 2 study site Untreated rampant caries and/or uncontrolled periodontal disease Class II division 2 malocclusion ( Edward Hartley Angle ) Use tobacco within last 6 month Uncontrolled diabetes ( subject history reveal absence control insulindependent/noninsulin dependent Diabetes Mellitus ) Current alcohol drug abuse Systemic local disease condition would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration Use substance influence bone metabolism Need systemic corticosteroid medication would influence postoperative healing and/or osseointegration History radiation head neck region Known pregnancy , pregnancy test perform per local requirement . Unable unwilling return followup visit period 5 year Unlikely able comply study procedure accord Investigators judgement Involvement planning conduct study ( applies Astra Tech staff staff study center ) Previous enrollment randomization treatment present study .
